title: Bug 16822 - Search results not cleared after moving compilation unit
OB: Search result for declaration of X persists in the search view after moving compilation unit X.java from 'P/src1' to 'P/src2'.
EB: After moving compilation unit X.java from 'P/src1' to 'P/src2', the search result for declaration of X should be removed from the search view.
SR: Create project P with 2 source folders 'src1' and 'src2'.

Create compilation unit X.java under 'P/src1'.
public class X {}
Observe: The search result is still in the search view.

Double-clicking on the search result opens a 'Search Error' dialog, stating:
An error occurred while creating a Java element.
Reason: X.java does not exist.
